bot.missing_interaction: This %INTERACTION% doesn't have an event set up yet!

command.error: One of my developers made an error while making this command! Don't worry, the error is not on your side. Please contact <@360249987927638016>, <@473860522710794250>, or <@173336582265241601> if this keeps occurring.
command.maintenance: I'm currently under maintenance, please try again later.

description.autopush: Push textures from a result channel to GitHub.
description.feedback: Create a new suggestion or bug report on our GitHub bug tracker.
description.backup: Back up all files to the GitHub Database repository.
description.hotfix: Fix something (may change at any time).
description.remove: Remove files from a pack repository. This does not remove contributions or other pack-specific data.

command.feedback_sent: Your ticket will be created shortly on GitHub. Thank you for helping us improve the bot!
command.backup_failed: At least one collection could not be backed up. Please check the developer logs for more information.
command.no_permission: You don't have permission to run this command!

image.input_too_big: The input picture is too big!
image.output_too_big: The output picture will be too big!

info.title: Hi, I'm CompliBot Submissions. I'm a fully automated texture pushing and submission system for the Faithful Discord servers.
info.subtitle: And I think I turned out pretty well.

submitting.title: Submitting
submitting.description:
- Upload an image file to a submission channel to submit a texture.
- Add co-authors using Discord mentions or curly brackets.
- View and vote on textures using the provided voting reactions and image manipulation buttons.
- [*More Information*](https://docs.faithfulpack.net/pages/manuals/contributor-handbook)

developing.title: Developing
developing.description:
I'm fully open source (written in TypeScript and Discord.js) and can be cloned at my GitHub repository [here](https://github.com/faithful-resource-pack/complibot-submissions).

If you're interested in developing, contact <@473860522710794250>, <@360249987927638016>, or <@173336582265241601> for more information.

cancelled.error_footer: This message will self-destruct in %SECONDS% seconds!

choice_embed.description: If you can't find what you're looking for, please be more specific!

submission.no_result_channel: Could not fetch corresponding result channel! Please make sure that the pack data has been set up correctly in the web app.
submission.image_not_attached: Please attach an image to your message!
submission.invalid_format: Please provide a valid `.png` file. Other file formats like `.zip` or `.tga` are currently not supported.
submission.does_not_exist: The specified texture name or ID doesn't exist!
submission.no_name_given: No texture name or ID was found in your submission message!
submission.cant_compare: This texture is too big to create a comparison image!
